title: 820-5209 fast fan
message:
Arrived with fast fan spin. Never disassembled before.

fan runs very fast. HW monitor says HD bay 1 is 249C and HD bay 2 is 129C

Any idea what needs to be replaced ?

title: 820-5209 fast fan
message:
HD bay 1 should have a temp sensor.
Strange failure if nobody touched it before,

As no schematics for these machines, may be better to install MacFanSpeed and set the fan to follow CPU temp.
